original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto paṭṭo hoti cīvarakammaṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmai upanandaḥ sakya putto paṭṭaḥ hoti cīvara kammam kātu

original: So paṭapilotikānaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ karitvā surattaṁ suparikammakataṁ katvā pārupi.
analyzed: saḥ saṅghāṭim karitvā su rattam su parikamma katam katvā pārupi

original: Atha kho aññataro paribbājako mahagghaṁ paṭaṁ pārupitvā yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ paribbājakaḥ mahaggham paṭam pārupitvā yena āyasmant upanandaḥ sakya putto tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam upanandam sakya puttam etat avoca

original: Atha kho so paribbājako taṁ saṅghāṭiṁ pārupitvā paribbājakārāmaṁ agamāsi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ paribbājakaḥ tam saṅghāṭim pārupitvā paribbājaka ārāmam agamāsi
tena me āvuso paṭena parivattitā ati
kati hipi tyāya āvuso saṅghāṭi bhavissati

original: Atha kho so paribbājako—“saccaṁ kho paribbājakā āhaṁsu—‘katihipi myāyaṁ saṅghāṭi bhavissati. Soyeva me paṭo varo’”ti
analyzed: atha kho saḥ paribbājaka usaccam kho paribbājakāḥ āha su kati hipi myā ayam saṅghāṭi bhavissati saḥ yā iva me paṭaḥ

original: yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: yena āyasmai upanandaḥ sakya puttaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam upanandam sakya puttam etat avoca

original: “handa te, āvuso, saṅghāṭi; dehi me paṭan”ti.
analyzed: handa te āvuso saṅghāṭi dehi me paṭanti
nanu tvaḥ āvuso mayā vuttaḥ jānāhi āvuso ti

original: Atha kho so paribbājako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: atha kho so paribbājakaḥ ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti

original: kiṁ pana pabbajito pabbajitassa na dassatī”ti.
analyzed: kim pana pabbajitaḥ pabbajitassa na dassati iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa paribbājakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tassa paribbājakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhiṁ kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjissatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai upanandaḥ sakya putto paribbājakena saddhim kaya vikkayam samāpajjissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam upanandam sakya puttam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, paribbājakena saddhiṁ kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam upananda paribbājakena saddhim kaya vikkayam samāpajjasi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, paribbājakena saddhiṁ kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa paribbājakena saddhim kaya vikkayam samāpajjissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṁ kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu nānappakārakam kaya vikkayam samāpajjeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārāḥ antamasaḥ cuṇṇa piṇḍaḥ api danta kaṭṭham pi dasika suttam pi

original: iminā imaṁ dehi, iminā imaṁ āhara, iminā imaṁ parivattehi, iminā imaṁ cetāpehīti. Ajjhācarati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: iminā imam dehi iminā imam āhara iminā imam parivattehi iminā imam cetāpehi iti ajjhācarati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Yato kayitañca hoti vikkayitañca attano bhaṇḍaṁ parahatthagataṁ parabhaṇḍaṁ attano hatthagataṁ, nissaggiyaṁ hoti.
analyzed: yatas kayitam ca hoti vikkayitam ca attanaḥ bhaṇḍam para hattha gatam para bhaṇḍam attanaḥ hattha gata nissaggiyam hoti

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā
aha bhante nānappakārakam kaya vikkayam samāpajji
imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe
kaya vikkaye kaya vikkaya saññī nissaggiyam pācittiya
kaya vikkaye na kaya vikkaya saññī nissaggiyam pācittiya
na kaya vikkaye kaya vikkaya saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
na kaya vikkaye vematikaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa
na kaya vikkaye na kaya vikkaya saññī anāpatti

original: “idaṁ amhākaṁ atthi, amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti bhaṇati,
analyzed: idam amhākam atthi amhākam ca iminā ca iminā ca atthi iti bhaṇati
